price: ¿Acaso [creen que] los iba a privar del Mensaje porque son un pueblo de transgresores?
arabic: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: afanaḍribu ʿankumu al-dhik'ra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman mus'rifīna
